mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Peyroux, Henri
mdRecord.dcterms:description: After bringing two thousand Acadians with their industry to Louisiana was made captain for 18 years without receiving promotion; has decided to profit from the cessation of Louisiana to the United States to renounce his service to the Spanish; will go to New Orleans and offer his services, zeal and knowledge to United States.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1804 March 20, New Madrid, [Missouri] to [Thomas] Jefferson, n.p.
